wordGroup: pancreatic cancer 胰腺癌；胰脏癌

sentences.en: The government has given the Maryland teenager patent rights to the pancreatic caner test.
sentences.cn: 政府已经授予马里兰青年胰腺癌测试的专利权。

sentences.en: He died in 2003 of pancreatic cancer.
We found out he had pancreatic cancer.
sentences.cn: 我们发现他患了胰腺癌。
